about_the_game:
Add-on for Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii that adds the Hero of Yokohama, Ichiban Kasuga and his pet crawfish Nancy to your pirate crew.

■ ICHIBAN PIRATE CREW SET
- Ichiban Kasuga crewmate
- Nancy supporter

*This special offer will be included if pre-ordered by February 20, 2025 at 14:59(UTC).
The “Ichiban Pirate Crew Set” will be available for purchase after the pre-order period.
*The “Ichiban Pirate Crew Set” will be available after the main character's pirate ship upgrade event in Chapter 2 of the main game.
*The contents of the ""Ichiban Pirate Crew Set"" will not be counted toward in-game achievements.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Blood, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, and Use of Tobacco and Alcohol.
